summary: Vial Traite Service - Service management application with client folders, interventions tracking, and technical documentation. Fixing critical access issues and data loss problems.
architectural_notes: Application uses Internet Identity for authentication
Data stored on Internet Computer backend (should be permanent)
Critical bug: Client folder section not responding to clicks
Data synchronization issues causing technical folder data loss
known_issues: Dossier Client button unresponsive - blocks access to interventions
Technical folder data lost/not loading properly
Potential data loading synchronization issues with backend
No error messages displayed when problems occur

existing_features.title: Fix the non-responsive 'Dossier Client' button/navigation that prevents users from accessing the client folder section when clicked
Restore full access to interventions from within the client folder section
Recover and restore the lost technical folder data, ensuring all previously stored files and folders are accessible
Add comprehensive error handling with clear, user-friendly error messages in French throughout the application, especially for data loading and navigation failures
Add visible loading indicators (spinners) throughout the application to show when data is being fetched or operations are in progress
Implement automatic retry logic for failed data loading operations with exponential backoff
Add data export functionality allowing users to download their data as PDF or JSON files for backup purposes
Strengthen data persistence and synchronization between frontend and backend to prevent future data loss

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix non-responsive 'Dossier Client' button - restore access to client folder section
Restore access to interventions from client folder section
Recover and secure lost technical folder data
Add clear error messages and better error handling throughout the app
Add loading indicators (spinners) to show data loading status
Implement automatic retry/reload on data loading failures
Add data export functionality (PDF/JSON) for backup purposes
